description:
If you love singing, this is the course you must take. You'll learn singing techniques that will get you from amateur to the professional level.

You'll learn singing techniques such as:

  • Breathing techniques
  • Warm-up training
  • Voice throwing
  • Voice pitching and how to get in tune
  • Different types of voices to use when singing

With step by step videos to help you craft your voice, you'll be drilled with lessons and introduced to many helpful techniques to aid your singing career as a professional.

Who should join this course?

  • Aspiring singers
  • Singer-songwriters
  • People wants to sing better with proven techniques
  • Singers yet to find their voice
  • Singers who often go out of tune
Course is instructed by two instructors:
  1. Alvin Chong
  2. Reuben Ch'ng
title: Sing Professionally - From Amateur to Pro in 30 Days
